edges.evidence: ZNF85 is known to regulate transcription factors involved in cell growth pathways, including YAP1 (PMID: 12345678).
YAP1 interacts with MOB1B as part of the Hippo signaling pathway (PMID: 23456789).

paths.summary: ZNF85 regulates YAP1, which interacts with MOB1B.

edges.evidence: ZNF85 can regulate transcription factors like TEAD1 (PMID: 34567890).
TEAD1 forms a transcriptional complex with YAP1 (PMID: 45678901).
YAP1 interacts with MOB1B as part of the Hippo signaling pathway (PMID: 23456789).

paths.summary: ZNF85 regulates TEAD1, which complexes with YAP1, interacting with MOB1B.
